item.description: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 is officially set to release this summer.Iron Galaxy Studios, Tony Hawk and Activision announced that the remake of the beloved skateboarding game will finally be dropping on July 11 for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch and PC via Steam, Battle.net and the Microsoft Store.æ‰˜å°¼Â·éœå…‹ï¼ˆTony Hawkï¼‰çš„Pro Skater 3 + 4å°†å°†åŸå§‹æ¸¸æˆçš„ç»å…¸å†…å®¹ä¸æ–°çš„æºœå†°è€…ï¼Œç–¯ç‹‚çš„æŠ€å·§ï¼Œæ›´å¥½çš„é…ä¹èä¸ºä¸€Kostonï¼ŒRodney Mullenï¼ŒJamie Thomasï¼ŒRune Glifbergå’ŒBob Burnquistï¼Œä»¥åŠRayssa Lealï¼ŒChloe Covellï¼ŒJamie Foyï¼ŒZion Wrightå’ŒYuto Horigomeç­‰æ–°è¡€æ¶²ã€‚ç©å®¶å°†èƒ½å¤Ÿå¬å–åŒ…æ‹¬Motorheadï¼ŒGang Starrå’ŒKrs-Oneçš„å‰Šå‡çš„åŸå§‹é…ä¹ï¼Œä»¥åŠæ•æ‰ç°ä»£æ»‘æ¿æ–‡åŒ–ç²¾ç¥çš„æ–°äº§å“ã€‚è§‚çœ‹ä¸Šé¢çš„é¢„å‘Šç‰‡ã€‚æ‰˜å°¼Â·éœå…‹ï¼ˆTony Hawkï¼‰çš„Pro Skater 3 + 4æ»´7æœˆ11æ—¥ã€‚éœå…‹ï¼ˆHawk
